まさか中世の遺構……？

history, but it still goes back to the Middle Ages

Tack on all the subways and waterways we've been
building, and the underground's a sprawling mess and
a half now.

I see... I suppose it does make sense that a place like
this would exist here when you think about it enough.

jpnSearchText: 魔獣……いや、霊体の類いかよ。

Never seen THEM in the capital. What the hell's up
with this?

jpnSearchText:
首都で見かけたことはねえが

engSearchText:
Sure you don't wanna turn back and wait outside
the station?

……どうする？
やっぱり駅前あたりで待つか？

engSearchText: The café'd be a good spot to—

jpnSearchText: ちょうどカフェもあるし──

engChrName: No. I'm fine.
engSearchText: No. I'm fine.

jpnSearchText: いえ……大丈夫です。

engSearchText:
I have a feeling my staff and arts will be highly
effective against foes like these.

jpnSearchText:
何となくですけど……この武装や

engSearchText:
So if anything, I'm relieved I came with you instead
of staying behind.

jpnSearchText: ………ハハッ。

engSearchText: Got me good. Then let's do this.
jpnChrName: 覚悟完了か、いいだろう。
jpnSearchText: 覚悟完了か、いいだろう。

engChrName: I'll back you up, so feel free to go hog wild.
engSearchText: I'll back you up, so feel free to go hog wild.

こちらもサポートする。
力まず思いっきり行ってみろ。

engChrName: Then I will!
engSearchText: Then I will!

jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

.

explainin' it.

engSearchText: Whew... I think I have a better handle on them now.

ふうっ……何とか、
コツが掴めてきた気がします。

engSearchText:
You did good, but no lettin' your guard down because
of it.

jpnSearchText:
……悪くはねえな。
ただし油断はするんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: R-Right. Of course.
engSearchText: R-Right. Of course.
jpnChrName: は、はいっ。
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ。

engChrName: (Really was a hell of a performance—especially since this is likely her first day fighting for real.)
engSearchText:
(Really was a hell of a performance—especially since
this is likely her first day fighting for real.)

jpnSearchText:
（……実際大したタマだぜ。
実戦なんざ今日が初めてだろうに。）

engChrName: (No way she wasn't raised with a silver spoon in her mouth, but she's braver than most would give her credit for.)
engSearchText:
(No way she wasn't raised with a silver spoon in her
mouth, but she's braver than most would give her
credit for.)

jpnSearchText:
（良い所の育ちなのは間違いなさそうだが
妙に腹も据わってやがる……）

engChrName: (Throw in the weird orbment she's after...and I got questions. Just who is this girl?)
engSearchText:
(Throw in the weird orbment she's after...and I
got questions. Just who is this girl?)
jpnChrName: （訳アリの依頼品といい、一体──）
jpnSearchText: （訳アリの依頼品といい、一体──）

engChrName: By the way...
engSearchText: By the way...
jpnChrName: その……ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: その……ヴァンさん。

engChrName: S'up?
engSearchText: S'up?
jpnChrName: ああ、なんだ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、なんだ？

engChrName: I've been bracing myself well enough against monsters and spirits so far...
engSearchText:
I've been bracing myself well enough against monsters
and spirits so far...
jpnChrName: 魔獣や霊体相手に気を抜かないのは もちろんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
魔獣や霊体相手に気を抜かないのは
もちろんですけど……

engChrName: ...but do you think you could also tell me a little more about A since we might be going up against them?
engSearchText:
...but do you think you could also tell me a little more
about A since we might be going up against them?
jpnChrName: ………《Ａ》という方々について 念のため伺っても構わないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
………《Ａ》という方々について
念のため伺っても構わないでしょうか？

engChrName: *sigh* Guess I should, huh?
engSearchText: *sigh* Guess I should, huh?
jpnChrName: …………ふう、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: …………ふう、そうだな。

engChrName: Ordinary people are better off not knowing a damn thing...
engSearchText:
Ordinary people are better off not knowing a
damn thing...

jpnSearchText:
本来、一般人が
知るべき情報じゃねえんだが……

engSearchText:
...but if they're after your great-grandfather's
memento, then I guess there's no getting around it.

jpnSearchText:
あんたの曾祖父さんの遺産が絡む以上、
耳を塞ぐってのも確かに違うか。

engChrName: That's what I was thinking, too.
engSearchText: That's what I was thinking, too.
jpnChrName: ……はい、そう思ったので。
jpnSearchText: ……はい、そう思ったので。

engSearchText: First, 'A' is just a codename.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》というのは当然、隠語だ。
jpnSearchText: 《Ａ》というのは当然、隠語だ。

engSearchText:
It's short for 'Almata.' They're mafia that go way back
here in Calvard.

jpnSearchText:
正式名称は《アルマータ》──
共和国に昔からあるマフィアの名だ。

engSearchText: I don't like the sound of that already...
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》……マフィア、ですか。
jpnSearchText: 《アルマータ》……マフィア、ですか。

engChrName: Still, they weren't that big a group back then.
engSearchText: Still, they weren't that big a group back then.
jpnChrName: つっても、 元々それほどデカイ組織じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
つっても、
元々それほどデカイ組織じゃない。

engChrName: We're not talking about a big Eastern syndicate here. They were nothin'...
engSearchText:
We're not talking about a big Eastern syndicate here.
They were nothin'...
jpnChrName: 有名な東方系シンジケートに比べりゃ、 有象無象の一つだったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
有名な東方系シンジケートに比べりゃ、
有象無象の一つだったらしい。

engSearchText:
...until they weren't. Over the past few years, they've
gotten much, much bigger.

jpnSearchText:
だが──ここ数年で数倍、
いや数十倍の勢力へと拡大した。

engSearchText: Now they're the talk of the criminal underworld.

今のカルバードの裏社会・暗黒街の
トレンドといってもいい存在だ。

engSearchText: W-Wow...

jpnSearchText: ……そ、そんな人たちが……

engSearchText: But their name never ends up in the paper, I assume?

jpnSearchText:
当然、新聞なんかで報道は
されていないんですよね……？

Yeah. Obvious why big papers like the Tyrell Times
won't cover 'em, but even gossip rags don't have
the balls.

ああ、タイレルみたいな大手は勿論、
ゴシップ誌すら二の足を踏んでいる。

engSearchText: It's an unspoken rule: cross the line and you're done.

理由は簡単──下手すれば
マジで消されるかもしれねえからだ。

I still don't know what the deal is with this memento
you're after...

あんたの曾祖父さんの遺産ってのが
どういうものかは知らねぇが……

the cops.

できればギルドか警察に
頼っちまった方がベターだろう。

engChrName: B-But...
engSearchText: B-But...

Well, not my job to force you to turn to 'em.
Mine's to be there if you feel like you can't.

ま、無理強いはしねえ。
だからこその裏解決屋（オレ）でもある。

the glory.

jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよブツは先に回収して
ギルドを連中にぶつけるのがベストだな。

Y-You make the guild sound like they're your
cleanup crew...

そ、それはあまりにギルドの方々に
申し訳ないんじゃ……

……ふふっ、本当に。
ヴァンさんって“悪い人”ですね。

move on.

何よりの誉め言葉だな。
──そろそろ行くぞ。

engSearchText: Of course. ...Oh! Come to think of it...
jpnChrName: はいっ。 ……あ、そういえば。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ。
……あ、そういえば。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

in this?

Gargoyles, huh?

Maybe Giacomo had a better eye for hideouts than
I thought.

こんな場所を隠れ家にするとは
ジャコモも抜け目ねえっつーか。
………………………

great-grandfather's diaries.

jpnSearchText: ……グスッ、本当にあったんだ……

it glowing?

確かに導力器の一種のようだが。

……！？

engChrName: I'm fine. Tired as all hell, but I don't feel any pain.
engSearchText: I'm fine. Tired as all hell, but I don't feel any pain.
jpnChrName: ……ああ……… 消耗はしたがダメージはねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ………
消耗はしたがダメージはねえ。

engChrName: Can't believe I just took down a pair of drugged-up mafiosos like they were snot-nosed kids. What a monster.
engSearchText:
Can't believe I just took down a pair of drugged-up
mafiosos like they were snot-nosed kids. What
a monster.
jpnChrName: 薬物強化した連中を子供扱いとは…… ……文字通りの化け物かよ。
jpnSearchText:
薬物強化した連中を子供扱いとは……
……文字通りの化け物かよ。

engChrName: What was that? You saw Mare, too, right?
engSearchText: What was that? You saw Mare, too, right?
jpnChrName: ……今のって…… メアちゃんも現れましたよね？
jpnSearchText:
……今のって……
メアちゃんも現れましたよね？

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ───
jpnSearchText: ああ───

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
jpnChrName: はいはい、なんなの？ 用件を言いなさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、なんなの？
用件を言いなさいよね。

engChrName: Figures. All she spits out is what she's programmed.
engSearchText: Figures. All she spits out is what she's programmed.
jpnChrName: そりゃそうだ…… ただのパターン反応だからな。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃそうだ……
ただのパターン反応だからな。

engChrName: She's got no sentience. The tech hasn't come far enough to give her any.
engSearchText:
She's got no sentience. The tech hasn't come far
enough to give her any.
jpnChrName: 自由人格なんぞ無いし、 そんな技術も確立されてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
自由人格なんぞ無いし、
そんな技術も確立されてねぇ。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: でも……だとしたら──
jpnSearchText: でも……だとしたら──

engChrName: ...was it the Genesis, then?
engSearchText: ...was it the Genesis, then?
jpnChrName: この《ゲネシス》のせい、でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText: この《ゲネシス》のせい、でしょうか……？

engChrName: Can't imagine it was a fluke.
engSearchText: Can't imagine it was a fluke.
jpnChrName: 関係してるのは確かだろうな。
jpnSearchText: 関係してるのは確かだろうな。

engChrName: So that thing's called a Genesis?
engSearchText: So that thing's called a Genesis?
jpnChrName: それより── 《ゲネシス》って言うのか、それは。
jpnSearchText:
それより──
《ゲネシス》って言うのか、それは。

engChrName: Yes—or that's what my great-grandfather called it in his diaries.
engSearchText:
Yes—or that's what my great-grandfather called it in
his diaries.
jpnChrName: はい……曾祖父の手記に 書かれていた名前です。
jpnSearchText:
はい……曾祖父の手記に
書かれていた名前です。

engChrName: It's supposed to be one of eight, called collectively the Oct-Geneses.
engSearchText:
It's supposed to be one of eight, called collectively the
Oct-Geneses.
jpnChrName: 《オクト＝ゲネシス》── 全部で８つあるとありました。
jpnSearchText:
《オクト＝ゲネシス》──
全部で８つあるとありました。

engChrName: You sayin' there's eight of these?
engSearchText: You sayin' there's eight of these?
jpnChrName: おいおい……マジかよ。
jpnSearchText: おいおい……マジかよ。

engChrName: I'm gonna guess it was behind everything that happened here.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna guess it was behind everything that
happened here.
jpnChrName: ……メアの出現、そして俺が 妙なバケモンになっちまった現象。
jpnSearchText:
……メアの出現、そして俺が
妙なバケモンになっちまった現象。

engChrName: Behind Mare showin' up, behind me turnin' into that weird monster...
engSearchText:
Behind Mare showin' up, behind me turnin' into that
weird monster...
jpnChrName: それ以前に、この地下遺跡に 霊体なんかが現れてたのも……
jpnSearchText:
それ以前に、この地下遺跡に
霊体なんかが現れてたのも……

engChrName: Behind spirits poppin' up down here, too.
engSearchText: Behind spirits poppin' up down here, too.
jpnChrName: 恐らくその装置が原因だろう。
jpnSearchText: 恐らくその装置が原因だろう。

engChrName: Then we're of the same mind.
engSearchText: Then we're of the same mind.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: The diaries described them as for 'experimental observation' and nothing more.
engSearchText:
The diaries described them as for 'experimental
observation' and nothing more.
jpnChrName: “実験観測”に使うものだとかで 詳しくは判らないんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
“実験観測”に使うものだとかで
詳しくは判らないんですけど……

engChrName: Course they elected to omit the finer details.
engSearchText: Course they elected to omit the finer details.
jpnChrName: なるほど、肝心なことは 手記でもボカしてたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、肝心なことは
手記でもボカしてたわけだ。

engChrName: You know, when I accepted this job, I didn't think it'd be from a relative of the one and only Professor Epstein.
engSearchText:
You know, when I accepted this job, I didn't think
it'd be from a relative of the one and only
Professor Epstein.
jpnChrName: あんたの曾祖父── Ｃ・エプスタイン博士は。
jpnSearchText:
あんたの曾祖父──
Ｃ・エプスタイン博士は。
！！？？？

engChrName: Dead on, huh?
engSearchText: Dead on, huh?
jpnChrName: どうやら当たりみたいだな。
jpnSearchText: どうやら当たりみたいだな。

engChrName: That thing was made half a century ago around the time of the Orbal Revolution.
engSearchText:
That thing was made half a century ago around the
time of the Orbal Revolution.
jpnChrName: ──半世紀前の導力革命と 同時期くらいに造られた骨董品。
jpnSearchText:
──半世紀前の導力革命と
同時期くらいに造られた骨董品。

engChrName: It's easy to tell by lookin' at it just how much precision and skill went into makin' it.
engSearchText:
It's easy to tell by lookin' at it just how much
precision and skill went into makin' it.
jpnChrName: とんでもない精度の超絶技巧で 組み上げられてるのは一目瞭然だ。
jpnSearchText:
とんでもない精度の超絶技巧で
組み上げられてるのは一目瞭然だ。

engChrName: Then you got that it's an orbment capable of doing artifact-level stuff.
engSearchText:
Then you got that it's an orbment capable of doing
artifact-level stuff.
jpnChrName: 何より、確かに導力器（オーブメント）でありながら 古代遺物（アーティファクト）顔負けの超現象を起こす。
jpnSearchText:
何より、確かに導力器（オーブメント）でありながら
古代遺物（アーティファクト）顔負けの超現象を起こす。

engChrName: Even Epstein's three disciples couldn't have made somethin' so advanced back then.
engSearchText:
Even Epstein's three disciples couldn't have made
somethin' so advanced back then.
jpnChrName: その時期にそんな代物を造るのは 有名な《三高弟》にも無理だろう。
jpnSearchText:
その時期にそんな代物を造るのは
有名な《三高弟》にも無理だろう。

engChrName: Knock them out of the running, and you're left with the father of modern tech, Claude Epstein.
engSearchText:
Knock them out of the running, and you're left with
the father of modern tech, Claude Epstein.
jpnChrName: 彼らの師にして導力革命の父── クロード・エプスタイン以外には。
jpnSearchText:
彼らの師にして導力革命の父──
クロード・エプスタイン以外には。
…………………………

engChrName: I'm sorry for hiding it from you.
engSearchText: I'm sorry for hiding it from you.
jpnChrName: ……黙っていてごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText: ……黙っていてごめんなさい。

engChrName: I'll tell you everything there is to say. It all started when—
engSearchText:
I'll tell you everything there is to say. It all started
when—
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんには全てお話しします。 そもそものきっかけは……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんには全てお話しします。
そもそものきっかけは……

engChrName: Not now. Put it away—quick.
engSearchText: Not now. Put it away—quick.
jpnChrName: いや──話は後だ。 そいつを仕舞っとけ。
jpnSearchText:
いや──話は後だ。
そいつを仕舞っとけ。

engChrName: Van! Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Van! Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、大丈夫……！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、大丈夫……！？

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: これは……！
jpnSearchText: これは……！

engChrName: I see we were a few minutes too late.
engSearchText: I see we were a few minutes too late.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 一足遅かったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
一足遅かったようだな。

engChrName: Those two are—
engSearchText: Those two are—
jpnChrName: そ、そいつらはあの……！
jpnSearchText: そ、そいつらはあの……！

engChrName: They're from Almata! We finally caught them!
engSearchText: They're from Almata! We finally caught them!
jpnChrName: アルマータ構成員……！ やっと尻尾が掴めましたか！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ構成員……！
やっと尻尾が掴めましたか！

engChrName: Get lost! This is our territory!
engSearchText: Get lost! This is our territory!
jpnChrName: じゃ、邪魔するな！ こちらの縄張りだぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
じゃ、邪魔するな！
こちらの縄張りだぞ！？

engChrName: Who do you think you're talking to? This isn't a job for civilians!
engSearchText:
Who do you think you're talking to? This isn't a job
for civilians!
jpnChrName: そちらこそ……！ 民間組織は下がってください！
jpnSearchText:
そちらこそ……！
民間組織は下がってください！

engChrName: Just what happened here? I can see that you fought them, but beyond that...
engSearchText:
Just what happened here? I can see that you fought
them, but beyond that...
jpnChrName: いったい何が…… 彼らと交戦したみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
いったい何が……
彼らと交戦したみたいだけど。

engChrName: We fought, yeah. With how pumped fulla drugs they were, it was a miracle we could make it out with our skin intact.
engSearchText:
We fought, yeah. With how pumped fulla drugs they
were, it was a miracle we could make it out with our
skin intact.
jpnChrName: ああ……薬物強化までしてきた。 運よく凌げたが注意しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……薬物強化までしてきた。
運よく凌げたが注意しとけ。
……！

engChrName: Heh. As curious as I am about HOW you emerged victorious...
engSearchText:
Heh. As curious as I am about HOW you
emerged victorious...
jpnChrName: フッ…… どう凌いだか気になる所だが。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……
どう凌いだか気になる所だが。

engChrName: ...I trust you were able to help your client?
engSearchText: ...I trust you were able to help your client?
jpnChrName: そちらのお嬢さんの依頼も、 無事達成できたようだな？
jpnSearchText:
そちらのお嬢さんの依頼も、
無事達成できたようだな？

engChrName: No comment. That's between me and her.
engSearchText: No comment. That's between me and her.
jpnChrName: 守秘義務につきノーコメントだ。
jpnSearchText: 守秘義務につきノーコメントだ。

engChrName: Now, I know I owe both sides here a debt, but consider 'em paid.
engSearchText:
Now, I know I owe both sides here a debt, but
consider 'em paid.
jpnChrName: それぞれ借りがあったはずだが、 プラマイで貸しにしとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ借りがあったはずだが、
プラマイで貸しにしとくぜ。

engChrName: They might be at the bottom of the chain, but they're still in Almata. You can have one each.
engSearchText:
They might be at the bottom of the chain, but they're
still in Almata. You can have one each.
jpnChrName: 末端とはいえ《Ａ》の構成員── 一人ずつ引き渡してやる。
jpnSearchText:
末端とはいえ《Ａ》の構成員──
一人ずつ引き渡してやる。

engChrName: Excuse me?
engSearchText: Excuse me?
jpnChrName: なっ……
jpnSearchText: なっ……

engChrName: Wh-Who gave you the authority to—
engSearchText: Wh-Who gave you the authority to—
jpnChrName: な、なにを勝手な──
jpnSearchText: な、なにを勝手な──

engChrName: ...I suppose we do owe him for neutralizing them.
engSearchText: ...I suppose we do owe him for neutralizing them.
jpnChrName: ……確かに標的（ターゲット）の無力化は 彼の功績でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに標的（ターゲット）の無力化は
彼の功績でしょう。

engChrName: Very well. We shall take them in between us.
engSearchText: Very well. We shall take them in between us.
jpnChrName: フフ、ならばＣＩＤとギルドで 遠慮なく引き取らせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ならばＣＩＤとギルドで
遠慮なく引き取らせてもらおう。

engChrName: Maybe if you're lucky enough, they'll even talk. Now come on—let's get outta here.
engSearchText:
Maybe if you're lucky enough, they'll even talk.
Now come on—let's get outta here.
jpnChrName: もし吐いたら情報もな。 ──そんじゃあ行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
もし吐いたら情報もな。
──そんじゃあ行くぞ。

engChrName: Oh... Umm... Sure. But let me help you walk—
engSearchText: Oh... Umm... Sure. But let me help you walk—
jpnChrName: あ……わ、分かりました。 せめて肩を──
jpnSearchText:
あ……わ、分かりました。
せめて肩を──

engChrName: I'm good, I'm good.
engSearchText: I'm good, I'm good.
jpnChrName: あー、大丈夫だっつの。
jpnSearchText: あー、大丈夫だっつの。

engChrName: This is clearly only the beginning of something much greater.
engSearchText:
This is clearly only the beginning of something
much greater.
jpnChrName: 今回は手始め……“何か”が 動き始めているのは間違いない。
jpnSearchText:
今回は手始め……“何か”が
動き始めているのは間違いない。

engChrName: Sharpen your skills while you can, Van.
engSearchText: Sharpen your skills while you can, Van.
jpnChrName: 精々研ぎ澄ませておけ──ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 精々研ぎ澄ませておけ──ヴァン。

engChrName: Will do, René.
engSearchText: Will do, René.
jpnChrName: わーったよ、ルネ。
jpnSearchText: わーったよ、ルネ。

engChrName: Kincaid.
engSearchText: Kincaid.
jpnChrName: だから名前で呼ぶなっ。
jpnSearchText: だから名前で呼ぶなっ。
…………………………

engChrName: (I can't let him keep living like this.)
engSearchText: (I can't let him keep living like this.)
jpnChrName: （──やっぱり認められない。）
jpnSearchText: （──やっぱり認められない。）

engChrName: (Why must you insist on shouldering all of the burden yourself?)
engSearchText:
(Why must you insist on shouldering all of the
burden yourself?)
jpnChrName: （自分一人だけが背負って……   分かち合わせもしない在り方は。）
jpnSearchText:
（自分一人だけが背負って……
分かち合わせもしない在り方は。）

engChrName: Here we are. This was one of Giacomo's old bases.
engSearchText: Here we are. This was one of Giacomo's old bases.
jpnChrName: さてと、ここがジャコモの拠点の 一つな訳だが……
jpnSearchText:
さてと、ここがジャコモの拠点の
一つな訳だが……

engChrName: Sure enough, it looks as though the police have already seized everything he left behind here.
engSearchText:
Sure enough, it looks as though the police have
already seized everything he left behind here.
jpnChrName: やっぱり元々あった証拠品は 警察が押収済みのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり元々あった証拠品は
警察が押収済みのようですね。

engChrName: You never know! It's still possible they overlooked something!
engSearchText:
You never know! It's still possible they
overlooked something!
jpnChrName: それでも、まだ隠されている何かが あるかもしれません！
jpnSearchText:
それでも、まだ隠されている何かが
あるかもしれません！

engChrName: My thoughts exactly. Let's give this place a good combover and see if we can find clues to wherever his blackmail notebook is.
engSearchText:
My thoughts exactly. Let's give this place a good
combover and see if we can find clues to wherever his
blackmail notebook is.
jpnChrName: ああ、ゆすりネタ帳の手掛かりに なりそうな物がないか探してみるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ゆすりネタ帳の手掛かりに
なりそうな物がないか探してみるとすっか。

engChrName: Is it just me, or does this brick look different?
engSearchText: Is it just me, or does this brick look different?
jpnChrName: あっ、このレンガ…… 一部だけ何かが違うような？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、このレンガ……
一部だけ何かが違うような？

engChrName: Yeah. Looks like it was made with a different kinda clay.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Looks like it was made with a different
kinda clay.
jpnChrName: 使われている土の材質が 少し違うみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
使われている土の材質が
少し違うみたいだな。

engChrName: Let's try pokin' around it just in case.
engSearchText: Let's try pokin' around it just in case.
jpnChrName: 調べてみる価値はありそうだ、 どれどれ……
jpnSearchText:
調べてみる価値はありそうだ、
どれどれ……

engChrName: Van gave the brick and all those surrounding it a light knock.
engSearchText:
Van gave the brick and all those surrounding it a
light knock.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは怪しいレンガを叩き、 更に周囲のレンガを叩いた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは怪しいレンガを叩き、
更に周囲のレンガを叩いた。

engChrName: The one that looks different sounds different, too!
engSearchText: The one that looks different sounds different, too!
jpnChrName: あっ、音の響き方が違いますね！
jpnSearchText: あっ、音の響き方が違いますね！

engChrName: It was a lot lighter.
engSearchText: It was a lot lighter.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんが見つけたレンガの方は 軽い音がします。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんが見つけたレンガの方は
軽い音がします。

engChrName: I've read stories where bricks are used as switches. I wonder if that could be the case here.
engSearchText:
I've read stories where bricks are used as switches.
I wonder if that could be the case here.
jpnChrName: 小説だとこういう時は、レンガが スイッチになっていたりしますけど……
jpnSearchText:
小説だとこういう時は、レンガが
スイッチになっていたりしますけど……

engChrName: Only one way to find out.
engSearchText: Only one way to find out.
jpnChrName: ……外すのは難しそうだが、 ずらす事は出来そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……外すのは難しそうだが、
ずらす事は出来そうだな。

engChrName: I don't think we can outright remove it, but we can at least shift it around a bit.
engSearchText:
I don't think we can outright remove it, but we can at
least shift it around a bit.
jpnChrName: どれ、試しに動かしてみるか。
jpnSearchText: どれ、試しに動かしてみるか。

engChrName: After moving the brick, they discovered that letters were written upon its surface.
engSearchText:
After moving the brick, they discovered that letters
were written upon its surface.
jpnChrName: ヴァンが怪しいレンガを動かした所、 レンガの上面に文字が書かれていた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンが怪しいレンガを動かした所、
レンガの上面に文字が書かれていた。

engChrName: Oh, look! Something's written on it!
engSearchText: Oh, look! Something's written on it!
jpnChrName: おお～、文字が出てきましたね！
jpnSearchText: おお～、文字が出てきましたね！

engChrName: It says 'te 203.'
engSearchText: It says 'te 203.'
jpnChrName: 『/ｔｅ　２０３』──と書かれていますね。
jpnSearchText: 『/ｔｅ　２０３』──と書かれていますね。

engChrName: Hmm... Let's put it back how it was before we think on it.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Let's put it back how it was before we think
on it.
jpnChrName: ふむ……それじゃあコイツは戻すぞ。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……それじゃあコイツは戻すぞ。

engChrName: I think I got it!
engSearchText: I think I got it!
jpnChrName: あのっ、『/ｔｅ』という文字はもしかして……
jpnSearchText: あのっ、『/ｔｅ』という文字はもしかして……

engChrName: The other code was 'No/', and if we put them together, it says 'note'! Like 'notebook'!
engSearchText:
The other code was 'No/', and if we put them
together, it says 'note'! Like 'notebook'!
jpnChrName: もう一つの暗号の『Ｎｏ/』と繋げると『Ｎｏ/ｔｅ』。 ──ノートになるんじゃないでしょうかっ！
jpnSearchText:
もう一つの暗号の『Ｎｏ/』と繋げると『Ｎｏ/ｔｅ』。
──ノートになるんじゃないでしょうかっ！

engChrName: You're right!
engSearchText: You're right!
jpnChrName: あっ、本当ですね──！
jpnSearchText: あっ、本当ですね──！

engChrName: It doesn't necessarily mean that this leads to the book we're looking for, but they ARE connected. That's a good start.
engSearchText:
It doesn't necessarily mean that this leads to the book

S-Boosts seem like they'll be very useful when the
timing is right.
jpnChrName: Ｓ（シャード）ブースト……うまく使えば 戦闘の切り札になりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
Ｓ（シャード）ブースト……うまく使えば
戦闘の切り札になりそうですね。

engChrName: They are, though they ain't really the kinda thing you have to save for just the right time.
engSearchText:
They are, though they ain't really the kinda thing you
have to save for just the right time.
jpnChrName: つっても、あんま もったいぶるもんでもねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
つっても、あんま
もったいぶるもんでもねえけどな。

engChrName: Just use 'em when you can. That's all there is to it.
engSearchText: Just use 'em when you can. That's all there is to it.
jpnChrName: 使える時に使っていくぞ。
jpnSearchText: 使える時に使っていくぞ。

engChrName: Well, isn't that convenient?
engSearchText: Well, isn't that convenient?
jpnChrName: 確かに…… その方が効率がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……
その方が効率がよさそうですね。

engChrName: I'll keep that in mind!
engSearchText: I'll keep that in mind!
jpnChrName: 了解です、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: 了解です、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: About Breakable Objects
engSearchText: About Breakable Objects
jpnChrName: ～ブレイクオブジェクトについて～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～ブレイクオブジェクトについて～

engChrName: Attack vases, boxes, and the like scattered across fields and dungeons to break them.
engSearchText:
Attack vases, boxes, and the like scattered across
fields and dungeons to break them.
jpnChrName: フィールド上に点在している木箱や壺などの オブジェクトは、攻撃で破壊することができます。
jpnSearchText:
フィールド上に点在している木箱や壺などの
オブジェクトは、攻撃で破壊することができます。

engChrName: Destroying these will sometimes net items and CP in addition to filling the boost gauge, so no need to keep them pristine!
engSearchText:
Destroying these will sometimes net items and CP in
addition to filling the boost gauge, so no need to keep
them pristine!
jpnChrName: アイテムやＣＰを手に入れられる他、 ブーストゲージも溜まるので積極的に破壊しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
アイテムやＣＰを手に入れられる他、
ブーストゲージも溜まるので積極的に破壊しましょう。

engChrName: What a massive foe...
engSearchText: What a massive foe...
jpnChrName: 大きい敵ですね……
jpnSearchText: 大きい敵ですね……

engChrName: And the bigger they are, the harder they tend to hit.
engSearchText: And the bigger they are, the harder they tend to hit.
jpnChrName: 当たり前だが、ああいうデカブツは パワーも桁違いだ。
jpnSearchText:
当たり前だが、ああいうデカブツは
パワーも桁違いだ。

engChrName: Try not to get too close. We're best fightin' it from a distance.
engSearchText:
Try not to get too close. We're best fightin' it from
a distance.
jpnChrName: 適度な距離を保ちつつ仕掛けるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 適度な距離を保ちつつ仕掛けるぞ。

engChrName: About Deadly Strikes
engSearchText: About Deadly Strikes
jpnChrName: ～敵のハードアタックについて～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～敵のハードアタックについて～

engChrName: Every so often, certain enemies will use powerful attacks called Deadly Strikes.
engSearchText:
Every so often, certain enemies will use powerful
attacks called Deadly Strikes.
jpnChrName: 敵は一定間隔で強力な攻撃である 『ハードアタック』を仕掛けてきます。
jpnSearchText:
敵は一定間隔で強力な攻撃である
『ハードアタック』を仕掛けてきます。

engChrName: These attacks cannot be avoided, and if you are hit by one, you will be forced into battle at a disadvantage.
engSearchText:
These attacks cannot be avoided, and if you are hit by
one, you will be forced into battle at a disadvantage.
jpnChrName: ハードアタックは回避ができない上に 当たると敵の先制でコマンドバトルが始まります。
jpnSearchText:
ハードアタックは回避ができない上に
当たると敵の先制でコマンドバトルが始まります。

engChrName: It is best to either keep your distance and remain vigilant for these attacks, or to deploy your own shards first.
engSearchText:
It is best to either keep your distance and remain
vigilant for these attacks, or to deploy your own
shards first.
jpnChrName: なので十分に距離を取るか、 先手を打ってシャード展開するとよいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
なので十分に距離を取るか、
先手を打ってシャード展開するとよいでしょう。

engChrName: Bear in mind that enemies with low HP tend to use Deadly Strikes more frequently.
engSearchText:
Bear in mind that enemies with low HP tend to use
Deadly Strikes more frequently.
jpnChrName: なお敵はピンチになると、ハードアタックを 高頻度で使ってくるようになるので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
なお敵はピンチになると、ハードアタックを
高頻度で使ってくるようになるので注意して下さい。

engChrName: All right. Let's do it!
engSearchText: All right. Let's do it!
jpnChrName: とっととやれ──！
jpnSearchText: とっととやれ──！

engChrName: Okay! Doin' it, then!
engSearchText: Okay! Doin' it, then!
jpnChrName: りょーかい、アタシに任せて！
jpnSearchText: りょーかい、アタシに任せて！

engChrName: Shard swell! The Grendel's all yours!
engSearchText: Shard swell! The Grendel's all yours!
jpnChrName: シャード解放── 悪夢を纏え（テイク・ザ・グレンデル）！
jpnSearchText:
シャード解放──
悪夢を纏え（テイク・ザ・グレンデル）！

engChrName: Agh!
engSearchText: Agh!
jpnChrName: グオオッ！？
jpnSearchText: グオオッ！？

engChrName: What the—?!
engSearchText: What the—?!
jpnChrName: ナンダっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ナンダっ……！？
あ……

engChrName: (What IS this...feeling?)
engSearchText: (What IS this...feeling?)
jpnSearchText: （……この感覚───は……………）

engChrName: Argh... Well, I'd take fighting this thing over our bosses any day of the week!
engSearchText:
Argh... Well, I'd take fighting this thing over our
bosses any day of the week!
jpnChrName: グッ……ボスたちに比ベレバ ドウということはナイ──！！
jpnSearchText:
グッ……ボスたちに比ベレバ
ドウということはナイ──！！

engChrName: You're damn right! We're taking you down in the name of Almata!
engSearchText:
You're damn right! We're taking you down in the
name of Almata!
jpnChrName: 蹂躙スル──！！ 《アルマータ》の名に賭ケテ！！
jpnSearchText:
蹂躙スル──！！
《アルマータ》の名に賭ケテ！！

engChrName: OHHHHHHHH!
engSearchText: OHHHHHHHH!
jpnChrName: ヲヲヲヲヲヲヲヲンンンッ！！！
jpnSearchText: ヲヲヲヲヲヲヲヲンンンッ！！！

engChrName: I was worried this might happen.
engSearchText: I was worried this might happen.
jpnChrName: やっぱりか……
jpnSearchText: やっぱりか……

engChrName: The tracker's so old that its signal is too weak to accurately follow underground like this.
engSearchText:
The tracker's so old that its signal is too weak to
accurately follow underground like this.
jpnChrName: 型落ち品なだけあって、地下になると 発信機の導力波が弱すぎて追えねえみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
型落ち品なだけあって、地下になると
発信機の導力波が弱すぎて追えねえみたいだな。

engChrName: Should we split up and see if we can find them?
engSearchText: Should we split up and see if we can find them?
jpnChrName: 二手に分かれて捜索しましょうか？
jpnSearchText: 二手に分かれて捜索しましょうか？

engChrName: Please wait one moment.
engSearchText: Please wait one moment.
jpnChrName: いえ、お待ちください。
jpnSearchText: いえ、お待ちください。

engChrName: The transmitter's orbal waves are faint, but it is possible to detect them.
engSearchText:
The transmitter's orbal waves are faint, but it is
possible to detect them.
jpnChrName: 微弱ながらも……発信機の 導力波そのものは確認できています。
jpnSearchText:
微弱ながらも……発信機の
導力波そのものは確認できています。

engChrName: So if I use Marduk's search software, I should be able to pinpoint the transmitter's rough location.
engSearchText:
So if I use Marduk's search software, I should be able
to pinpoint the transmitter's rough location.
jpnChrName: マルドゥック社のサーチシステムを応用すれば 位置を把握出来るかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥック社のサーチシステムを応用すれば
位置を把握出来るかもしれません。

engChrName: You can really do that?!
engSearchText: You can really do that?!
jpnChrName: 本当ですか！？
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか！？

engChrName: Good thing we've got you with us.
engSearchText: Good thing we've got you with us.
jpnChrName: ハッ、頼りになるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、頼りになるじゃねえか。

engChrName: It worked.
engSearchText: It worked.
jpnChrName: ──掴みました。
jpnSearchText: ──掴みました。

engChrName: The transmitter is currently north of us and moving farther into the ruins.
engSearchText:
The transmitter is currently north of us and moving
farther into the ruins.
jpnChrName: 発信機は、北の方角…… 遺跡の奥に向かって移動しているようです。
jpnSearchText:
発信機は、北の方角……
遺跡の奥に向かって移動しているようです。

engChrName: You really did it! That's amazing!
engSearchText: You really did it! That's amazing!
jpnChrName: すごいです、リゼットさん……！
jpnSearchText: すごいです、リゼットさん……！

engChrName: You're really earnin' your keep, huh? Let's get movin'.
engSearchText: You're really earnin' your keep, huh? Let's get movin'.
jpnChrName: ハッ、優秀なＳＣ様がいると助かるな。 早速向かってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、優秀なＳＣ様がいると助かるな。
早速向かってみるぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: あいよっと。
jpnSearchText: あいよっと。

engChrName: This is one of Giacomo's old hideouts!
engSearchText: This is one of Giacomo's old hideouts!
jpnChrName: ！ ここは…… ジャコモさんのアジトの一つの……
jpnSearchText:
！ ここは……
ジャコモさんのアジトの一つの……

engChrName: Huh. There's a funny coincidence.
engSearchText: Huh. There's a funny coincidence.
jpnChrName: ったく、妙に縁のある場所だぜ……
jpnSearchText: ったく、妙に縁のある場所だぜ……

engChrName: Anyway, we ain't got time to waste. We're goin' in!
engSearchText: Anyway, we ain't got time to waste. We're goin' in!
jpnChrName: とにかく、悠長にしてる暇はねえ。 中に突入するぞ！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、悠長にしてる暇はねえ。
中に突入するぞ！

engChrName: Several minutes before...
engSearchText: Several minutes before...
jpnChrName: 時は遡り数分前────
jpnSearchText: <C1>時は遡り数分前────

engChrName: You son of a bitch! What are we even doing here?!
engSearchText: You son of a bitch! What are we even doing here?!
jpnChrName: クソッ……こんな所まで連れて来て 一体どういうつもりだよ！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……こんな所まで連れて来て
一体どういうつもりだよ！

engChrName: You can shove your 'divine punishment' up your ass!
engSearchText: You can shove your 'divine punishment' up your ass!
jpnChrName: 放せよっ！　“神罰”だか何だか 知らねえがふざけんな！
jpnSearchText:
放せよっ！　“神罰”だか何だか
知らねえがふざけんな！

engChrName: Oh, Aidios, please forgive me for my sins...
engSearchText: Oh, Aidios, please forgive me for my sins...
jpnChrName: おお空の女神よ……どうか私の 悪行をお許しください……
jpnSearchText:
おお空の女神よ……どうか私の
悪行をお許しください……

engChrName: The purification ritual before the ceremony is now complete.
engSearchText:
The purification ritual before the ceremony is
now complete.
jpnChrName: さて、これで儀式の前の禊は整いましたね。
jpnSearchText: さて、これで儀式の前の禊は整いましたね。

engChrName: Now I shall summon a servant of the Goddess to deliver your punishment.
engSearchText:
Now I shall summon a servant of the Goddess to
deliver your punishment.
jpnChrName: それでは早速、女神様の御使いを お招きするとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは早速、女神様の御使いを
お招きするとしましょうか。

engChrName: O one of Her six hands, bless us with your presence!
engSearchText: O one of Her six hands, bless us with your presence!
jpnChrName: 空の女神に仕えし六手の御手よ、 今こそ地上に姿を現したまえ──！
jpnSearchText:
空の女神に仕えし六手の御手よ、
今こそ地上に姿を現したまえ──！

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!
jpnChrName: なあっ──！？
jpnSearchText: なあっ──！？

engChrName: Th-That's no servant of the Goddess! That's a monster!
engSearchText:
Th-That's no servant of the Goddess! That's
a monster!
jpnChrName: う、嘘だろ、何なんだこの魔獣はよ！？
jpnSearchText: う、嘘だろ、何なんだこの魔獣はよ！？

engChrName: I can't believe it...
engSearchText: I can't believe it...
jpnChrName: こ、これが女神様の御使い！？ そんな馬鹿な……！
jpnSearchText:
こ、これが女神様の御使い！？
そんな馬鹿な……！

engChrName: Heh heh. I will admit that as much as I tried to make this seem like a legitimate church, this part straddles the line of believability.
engSearchText:
Heh heh. I will admit that as much as I tried to make
this seem like a legitimate church, this part straddles
the line of believability.
jpnChrName: クク……まあ、宗教らしい設定を作り込んだのに この点だけ尤（もっと）もらしさに欠ける事は認めましょう。
jpnSearchText:
クク……まあ、宗教らしい設定を作り込んだのに
この点だけ尤（もっと）もらしさに欠ける事は認めましょう。

engChrName: Unfortunately, this is the only powerful monster the artifact is capable of summoning, so I fear it will have to do.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, this is the only powerful monster the
artifact is capable of summoning, so I fear it will have
to do.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、この遺物で使役できる強力な魔獣は コイツしかいなかったものでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、この遺物で使役できる強力な魔獣は
コイツしかいなかったものでしてね。

engChrName: It's a little nightmare to control, I'll have you know! It refuses to do what I tell it to unless it gets fed in a timely manner.
engSearchText:
It's a little nightmare to control, I'll have you know!
It refuses to do what I tell it to unless it gets fed in a
timely manner.
jpnChrName: しかも、定期的に餌をやらないと 魔獣が言う事を聞いてくれず……困ったものです。
jpnSearchText:
しかも、定期的に餌をやらないと
魔獣が言う事を聞いてくれず……困ったものです。

engChrName: Wh-What is the meaning of this?! Have you been deceiving us, Father?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What is the meaning of this?! Have you been
deceiving us, Father?!
jpnChrName: どういう事ですか教祖様っ！？ わ、私達を騙していたというのですか！？
jpnSearchText:
どういう事ですか教祖様っ！？
わ、私達を騙していたというのですか！？

engChrName: Not at all. I never expected anyone to really believe my lies—you just happened to be gullible enough to do so.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I never expected anyone to really believe
my lies—you just happened to be gullible enough to
do so.
jpnChrName: 貴方が勝手に私が作った嘘を 信じたのではありませんか。
jpnSearchText:
貴方が勝手に私が作った嘘を
信じたのではありませんか。

engChrName: Besides, when I said I would send you to meet your maker, I very much meant it.
engSearchText:
Besides, when I said I would send you to meet your
maker, I very much meant it.
jpnChrName: しかも、騙すだなんてとんでもない。
jpnSearchText: しかも、騙すだなんてとんでもない。

engChrName: That is exactly where you will be going.
engSearchText: That is exactly where you will be going.
jpnChrName: お話した通り、これからきちんと 女神様の下に送って差し上げますよ。
jpnSearchText:
お話した通り、これからきちんと
女神様の下に送って差し上げますよ。

engChrName: I-I can't believe it... Is this the end for us?
engSearchText: I-I can't believe it... Is this the end for us?
jpnChrName: マ、マジかよ…… 俺達……ここで死ぬのか……？
jpnSearchText:
マ、マジかよ……
俺達……ここで死ぬのか……？

engChrName: I-Is an apology what you want?! I'll apologize all you want, so please...!
engSearchText:
I-Is an apology what you want?! I'll apologize all you
want, so please...!
jpnChrName: あ、謝ればいいのか！？ それならいくらでも謝ってやるから……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、謝ればいいのか！？
それならいくらでも謝ってやるから……！

engChrName: I'm sorry, Stephan... I'm sorry, Dear... Forgive me for my stupidity...
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, Stephan... I'm sorry, Dear... Forgive me for
my stupidity...
jpnChrName: 母さん、それにステファン、済まない…… どうか馬鹿な父さんを許してくれ……
jpnSearchText:
母さん、それにステファン、済まない……
どうか馬鹿な父さんを許してくれ……

engChrName: Good job outin' yourself, you shady bastard.
engSearchText: Good job outin' yourself, you shady bastard.
jpnChrName: ハッ、インチキ宗教家の正体見たり──ってな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、インチキ宗教家の正体見たり──ってな。

engChrName: I sure didn't expect you to have an artifact, though. Where'd you get your hands on that thing?
engSearchText:
I sure didn't expect you to have an artifact, though.
Where'd you get your hands on that thing?
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、その割には古代遺物（アーティファクト）なんて 大層なモンを持ってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、その割には古代遺物（アーティファクト）なんて
大層なモンを持ってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Wh-Who are you?!
engSearchText: Wh-Who are you?!
jpnChrName: な、何者だ！？
jpnSearchText: な、何者だ！？

engChrName: No, I know you! You were at the ceremony earlier!
engSearchText: No, I know you! You were at the ceremony earlier!
jpnChrName: ──ッ、貴方達は 《天秤の浄化の儀》に参加していた！？
jpnSearchText:
──ッ、貴方達は
《天秤の浄化の儀》に参加していた！？

engChrName: You got us. We're Arkride Solutions, and the son of one of these fine gents asked us to come investigate you.
engSearchText:
You got us. We're Arkride Solutions, and the son of
one of these fine gents asked us to come
investigate you.
jpnChrName: ああ、コイツの息子から依頼を受けて来た 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、コイツの息子から依頼を受けて来た
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: You're looking at me... Then Stephan sent you?!
engSearchText: You're looking at me... Then Stephan sent you?!
jpnChrName: 私の……という事はステファンが……！？
jpnSearchText: 私の……という事はステファンが……！？

engChrName: Indeed. He wanted to know if you were safe and nothing more.
engSearchText:
Indeed. He wanted to know if you were safe and
nothing more.
jpnChrName: ええ、依頼内容は父親の安否の確認との事でした。
jpnSearchText: ええ、依頼内容は父親の安否の確認との事でした。

engChrName: However, now that we know you are in danger, we cannot turn a blind eye.
engSearchText:
However, now that we know you are in danger, we
cannot turn a blind eye.
jpnChrName: ウォルトン様が危険に晒されているのなら 守らせて頂くまでです。
jpnSearchText:
ウォルトン様が危険に晒されているのなら
守らせて頂くまでです。

engChrName: Move behind us, everyone.
engSearchText: Move behind us, everyone.
jpnChrName: 他のお二方も、わたくし達の後ろにお下がりを。
jpnSearchText: 他のお二方も、わたくし達の後ろにお下がりを。

engChrName: R-Right!
engSearchText: R-Right!
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……！
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……！

engChrName: You should also know that we recorded what you said earlier.
engSearchText:
You should also know that we recorded what you
said earlier.
jpnChrName: 失礼ですが、先程貴方の音声を 録音させてもらいました。
jpnSearchText:
失礼ですが、先程貴方の音声を
録音させてもらいました。

engChrName: I was disgusted by what I heard, too. You talk of good deeds, and yet it's all just a scheme to make you money.
engSearchText:
I was disgusted by what I heard, too. You talk of good
deeds, and yet it's all just a scheme to make
you money.
jpnChrName: 信じられません……多くの人を騙し、 『善行』と称してミラを貢がせるだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
信じられません……多くの人を騙し、
『善行』と称してミラを貢がせるだなんて。

engChrName: If that wasn't bad enough, now you're treating their lives like playthings. What are you even trying to do?!
engSearchText:
If that wasn't bad enough, now you're treating their
lives like playthings. What are you even trying to do?!
jpnChrName: その上こうして人の命を弄んで…… 一体何が目的なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
その上こうして人の命を弄んで……
一体何が目的なんですか？

engChrName: You just said it yourself: all I care about is getting rich.
engSearchText:
You just said it yourself: all I care about is
getting rich.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんなの分かり切っているでしょう。 ──金稼ぎですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そんなの分かり切っているでしょう。
──金稼ぎですよ。

engChrName: All I had to do was dream up a plausible-sounding church and flex my acting chops a little, and the mira just flowed right in.
engSearchText:
All I had to do was dream up a plausible-sounding
church and flex my acting chops a little, and the mira
just flowed right in.
jpnChrName: なにせ、宗教の設定を用意して一芝居打つだけで、 勝手にミラが集まってくるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ、宗教の設定を用意して一芝居打つだけで、
勝手にミラが集まってくるんですよ。

engChrName: I stumbled on this artifact by complete coincidence, but it lets me get rid of anyone who stands in my way, so I'm more than happy to keep using it.
engSearchText:
I stumbled on this artifact by complete coincidence,
but it lets me get rid of anyone who stands in my way,
so I'm more than happy to keep using it.
jpnChrName: 偶然手に入れた古代遺物を使えば 目障りな連中を脅す事も始末する事も出来る！
jpnSearchText:
偶然手に入れた古代遺物を使えば
目障りな連中を脅す事も始末する事も出来る！

engChrName: Heh. I can't picture a better enterprise than this one.
engSearchText: Heh. I can't picture a better enterprise than this one.
jpnChrName: クク、我ながら最高のビジネスだと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText: クク、我ながら最高のビジネスだと思いますよ。

engChrName: Maybe it is partly true that people shouldn't have fallen for your lies, and wanting to earn money isn't a bad thing in itself...
engSearchText:
Maybe it is partly true that people shouldn't have
fallen for your lies, and wanting to earn money isn't a
bad thing in itself...
jpnChrName: 騙される方も自業自得かもしれませんし、 お金稼ぎを悪く言うつもりはありません。
jpnSearchText:
騙される方も自業自得かもしれませんし、
お金稼ぎを悪く言うつもりはありません。

engChrName: ...but you're abusing the Goddess' name, and your way of earning is just so shameless and scummy that you don't deserve to get away with it!
engSearchText:
...but you're abusing the Goddess' name, and your
way of earning is just so shameless and scummy that
you don't deserve to get away with it!
jpnChrName: でも、女神様の名を悪用した上に 矜持もなにもない貴方の手口は許せません！
jpnSearchText:
でも、女神様の名を悪用した上に
矜持もなにもない貴方の手口は許せません！

engChrName: It's a clever little operation you've got going on here.
engSearchText: It's a clever little operation you've got going on here.
jpnChrName: 確かに、金稼ぎとしちゃあ よく出来た仕組みだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、金稼ぎとしちゃあ
よく出来た仕組みだろうな。

engChrName: Too bad it turns my stomach just thinking about it.
engSearchText: Too bad it turns my stomach just thinking about it.
jpnChrName: だが、胸くそ悪さも飛びぬけてやがるぜ。
jpnSearchText: だが、胸くそ悪さも飛びぬけてやがるぜ。

engChrName: Well! You're free to think whatever you want, because you'll be carrying those feelings to the grave in a few minutes.
engSearchText:
Well! You're free to think whatever you want, because
you'll be carrying those feelings to the grave in a
few minutes.
jpnChrName: ハッ、貴方がたが何を言おうと 口を封じてしまえば済む話です。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、貴方がたが何を言おうと
口を封じてしまえば済む話です。

engChrName: Go forth, divine messenger! You will be punishing them first!
engSearchText:
Go forth, divine messenger! You will be punishing
them first!
jpnChrName: まずは貴方達に天罰を下しましょう。 お行きなさい、女神の御使いよ──！
jpnSearchText:
まずは貴方達に天罰を下しましょう。
お行きなさい、女神の御使いよ──！

engChrName: C'mon! We're takin' him down!
engSearchText: C'mon! We're takin' him down!
jpnChrName: 行くぞお前ら！ 手っ取り早く片付けちまうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
行くぞお前ら！
手っ取り早く片付けちまうぞ！

engChrName: N-No! Are you all right, Father?!
engSearchText: N-No! Are you all right, Father?!
jpnChrName: そ……そんな…………！ 教祖様、ご無事ですか！
jpnSearchText:
そ……そんな…………！
教祖様、ご無事ですか！

engChrName: Y-Yes, I'm fine. I just never imagined that my pet would be defeated...
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, I'm fine. I just never imagined that my pet
would be defeated...
jpnChrName: あ……ああ……まさかあの魔獣が 負けてしまうだなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
あ……ああ……まさかあの魔獣が
負けてしまうだなんて……！

engChrName: Whew... Now we can finally talk for real.
engSearchText: Whew... Now we can finally talk for real.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これで落ち着いて話が 出来るってモンだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、これで落ち着いて話が
出来るってモンだな。

engChrName: *huff* That thing was tough. But now you've lost, and it's time for you to admit it and let everyone go!
engSearchText:
*huff* That thing was tough. But now you've lost, and
it's time for you to admit it and let everyone go!
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……中々手強かったですけど…… 観念して皆さんを解放してください！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、はぁ……中々手強かったですけど……
観念して皆さんを解放してください！

engChrName: That was a fun fight. But it's time to admit you've lost, Father Fraudster.
engSearchText:
That was a fun fight. But it's time to admit you've
lost, Father Fraudster.
jpnChrName: 案外楽しませてもらったが…… そろそろ観念するこったな、インチキ教祖。
jpnSearchText:
案外楽しませてもらったが……
そろそろ観念するこったな、インチキ教祖。

engChrName: Never! As long as I have this flute, I will never lose!
engSearchText: Never! As long as I have this flute, I will never lose!
jpnChrName: くっ──まだです！ この笛がある限り負けるはずがないッ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ──まだです！
この笛がある限り負けるはずがないッ！

engChrName: Get back up! You still haven't wiped the floor with them for me!
engSearchText:
Get back up! You still haven't wiped the floor with
them for me!
jpnChrName: 起き上がりなさい！ 今度こそこいつらを消し去るのですッ！
jpnSearchText:
起き上がりなさい！
今度こそこいつらを消し去るのですッ！

engChrName: (What was that sound? Was it from the ceiling or the flute?)
engSearchText:
(What was that sound? Was it from the ceiling or
the flute?)
jpnChrName: （今の音は…………   天井と、教祖の笛からか？）
jpnSearchText:
（今の音は…………
天井と、教祖の笛からか？）

engChrName: (I think it was both. That's bad—they're both at their limit.)
engSearchText:
(I think it was both. That's bad—they're both at
their limit.)
jpnChrName: （コイツはまずいな……どっちも限界っつう事か。）
jpnSearchText: （コイツはまずいな……どっちも限界っつう事か。）

engChrName: (If he blows the flute again, it's gonna break and the monster's gonna go berserk.)
engSearchText:
(If he blows the flute again, it's gonna break and the
monster's gonna go berserk.)
jpnChrName: （教祖がもう一度笛を吹けば、   笛が壊れて魔獣は暴走するだろう──）
jpnSearchText:
（教祖がもう一度笛を吹けば、
笛が壊れて魔獣は暴走するだろう──）

engChrName: (...Which is gonna make the crack in the ceiling even bigger, and that'll bring the entire thing down.)
engSearchText:
(...Which is gonna make the crack in the ceiling even
bigger, and that'll bring the entire thing down.)
jpnChrName: （そうなれば、天井のヒビが大きくなって   崩れ落ちてくるかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そうなれば、天井のヒビが大きくなって
崩れ落ちてくるかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (Should I finish off the monster before that can happen?)
engSearchText:
(Should I finish off the monster before that
can happen?)
jpnChrName: （天井が壊れる前に、イカ野郎に止めを刺すか……）
jpnSearchText: （天井が壊れる前に、イカ野郎に止めを刺すか……）

engChrName: (Or try and warn our conman priest even if he's probably not gonna listen?)
engSearchText:
(Or try and warn our conman priest even if he's
probably not gonna listen?)
jpnChrName: （もしくは……無駄かもしれねえが   教祖に警告をしてみるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（もしくは……無駄かもしれねえが
教祖に警告をしてみるか？）

engChrName: (I've got no time to stress over this. I'm just gonna have to try my luck.)
engSearchText:
(I've got no time to stress over this. I'm just gonna
have to try my luck.)
jpnChrName: （悩んでる暇はねえ──   ここは警告してみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（悩んでる暇はねえ──
ここは警告してみるか。）

engChrName: Listen up, 'cause I'm only gonna say this once:
engSearchText: Listen up, 'cause I'm only gonna say this once:
jpnChrName: よく聞け、ひとつだけ教えてやる。
jpnSearchText: よく聞け、ひとつだけ教えてやる。

engChrName: If you blow on that flute again, you're finished.
engSearchText: If you blow on that flute again, you're finished.
jpnChrName: その笛を吹けばアンタは破滅するぜ。
jpnSearchText: その笛を吹けばアンタは破滅するぜ。

engChrName: Hah! Sore losers, are we?
engSearchText: Hah! Sore losers, are we?
jpnChrName: ハッ……何を言うかと思えば負け惜しみですか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ……何を言うかと思えば負け惜しみですか！

engChrName: It's you who are finished! Go plead with the Goddess for Her forgiveness!
engSearchText:
It's you who are finished! Go plead with the Goddess
for Her forgiveness!
jpnChrName: 破滅するのは貴方達の方です！ せいぜい女神の下で自分の行いを悔い改めなさい！
jpnSearchText:
破滅するのは貴方達の方です！
せいぜい女神の下で自分の行いを悔い改めなさい！

engChrName: N-No! How could this happen?!
engSearchText: N-No! How could this happen?!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな、私の笛が──！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな、私の笛が──！？

engChrName: Aah!
engSearchText: Aah!
jpnChrName: きゃっ……！
jpnSearchText: きゃっ……！

engChrName: Nooo!
engSearchText: Nooo!
jpnChrName: うわああっ──！
jpnSearchText: うわああっ──！

engChrName: How does it still have this much strength left?!
engSearchText: How does it still have this much strength left?!
jpnChrName: まだこんな力を……！
jpnSearchText: まだこんな力を……！

engChrName: Still up for more, huh?!
engSearchText: Still up for more, huh?!
jpnChrName: まだやるってのかよ……！
jpnSearchText: まだやるってのかよ……！

engChrName: It's more formidable than I thought!
engSearchText: It's more formidable than I thought!
jpnChrName: 中々に手強い魔獣ですね……
jpnSearchText: 中々に手強い魔獣ですね……

engChrName: Bah. You damn idiot!
engSearchText: Bah. You damn idiot!
jpnChrName: チッ、馬鹿が──！
jpnSearchText: チッ、馬鹿が──！

engChrName: Get out the room, everyone! The ceiling's gonna collapse!
engSearchText:
Get out the room, everyone! The ceiling's
gonna collapse!
jpnChrName: 全員部屋の外に逃げろ！ 天井が崩れるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
全員部屋の外に逃げろ！
天井が崩れるぞ！

engChrName: Oh, no!
engSearchText: Oh, no!
jpnChrName: そんな──！
jpnSearchText: そんな──！

engChrName: Retreat!
engSearchText: Retreat!
jpnChrName: 一時撤退します！
jpnSearchText: 一時撤退します！

engChrName: Tch! We're outta here!
engSearchText: Tch! We're outta here!
jpnChrName: チッ、ずらかるしかねえか！
jpnSearchText: チッ、ずらかるしかねえか！

engChrName: (From this distance, we won't be able to—)
engSearchText: (From this distance, we won't be able to—)
jpnChrName: （この位置からだと、あの方は……）
jpnSearchText: （この位置からだと、あの方は……）

engChrName: Wait! Your judgment isn't finished yet!
engSearchText: Wait! Your judgment isn't finished yet!
jpnChrName: くっ、待ちなさいッ！ 裁きはまだ終わっていませんよ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、待ちなさいッ！
裁きはまだ終わっていませんよ！

engChrName: Don't let them get away! ATTACK THEM!
engSearchText: Don't let them get away! ATTACK THEM!
jpnChrName: あの者達を逃がす訳にはいきません、攻撃しなさい！
jpnSearchText: あの者達を逃がす訳にはいきません、攻撃しなさい！

engChrName: Aaaaaargh!
engSearchText: Aaaaaargh!
jpnChrName: グハァ──ッ！
jpnSearchText: グハァ──ッ！

engChrName: W-Wait! We're really going to be—!
engSearchText: W-Wait! We're really going to be—!
jpnChrName: ま、待ちなさい！ このままでは本当に──！
jpnSearchText:
ま、待ちなさい！
このままでは本当に──！

engChrName: AAAAAAH!
engSearchText: AAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: ぎゃああああ──！
jpnSearchText: ぎゃああああ──！

engChrName: ...He got what was coming to him.
engSearchText: ...He got what was coming to him.
jpnChrName: ……自業自得だと思います。
jpnSearchText: ……自業自得だと思います。

engChrName: ...Can't say he didn't deserve it.
engSearchText: ...Can't say he didn't deserve it.
jpnChrName: ……自業自得だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ……自業自得だろうな。

engChrName: If only he had listened to what Mr. Arkride said...
engSearchText: If only he had listened to what Mr. Arkride said...
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の忠告を素直に聞いていれば……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様の忠告を素直に聞いていれば……

engChrName: He made his choice. This is on him.
engSearchText: He made his choice. This is on him.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、これがヤツの選択だ。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ、これがヤツの選択だ。

engChrName: Anyway, we're goin' back to the surface. You're coming with us, too.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we're goin' back to the surface.
You're coming with us, too.
jpnChrName: とりあえず地上に上がるぞ。 それとアンタにはこの後一緒に来てもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず地上に上がるぞ。
それとアンタにはこの後一緒に来てもらうぜ。

engChrName: Does that mean...?
engSearchText: Does that mean...?
jpnChrName: ……！　それは、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: ……！　それは、もしかして……

engChrName: (I've got no time to stress over this. I'm just gonna have to finish the monster!)
engSearchText:
(I've got no time to stress over this. I'm just gonna
have to finish the monster!)
jpnChrName: （悩んでる暇はねえ──   魔獣に止めを刺す！）
jpnSearchText:
（悩んでる暇はねえ──
魔獣に止めを刺す！）

engChrName: No, you don't!
engSearchText: No, you don't!
jpnChrName: クッ、そうはさせませんよ──！
jpnSearchText: クッ、そうはさせませんよ──！

engChrName: N-No! How could this happen?!
engSearchText: N-No! How could this happen?!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな、私の笛が──！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな、私の笛が──！？

engChrName: Aah!
engSearchText: Aah!
jpnChrName: きゃっ……！
jpnSearchText: きゃっ……！

engChrName: Nooo!
engSearchText: Nooo!
jpnChrName: うわああっ──！
jpnSearchText: うわああっ──！

engChrName: How does it still have this much strength left?!
engSearchText: How does it still have this much strength left?!
jpnChrName: まだこんな力を……！
jpnSearchText: まだこんな力を……！

engChrName: Still up for more, huh?!
engSearchText: Still up for more, huh?!
jpnChrName: まだやるってのかよ……！
jpnSearchText: まだやるってのかよ……！

engChrName: It's more formidable than I thought!
engSearchText: It's more formidable than I thought!
jpnChrName: 中々に手強い魔獣ですね……
jpnSearchText: 中々に手強い魔獣ですね……

engChrName: Bah! We're short on time here!
engSearchText: Bah! We're short on time here!
jpnChrName: チッ、悠長にしてる暇はねえぞ！
jpnSearchText: チッ、悠長にしてる暇はねえぞ！

engChrName: What do you mean?!
engSearchText: What do you mean?!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！？

engChrName: Get the other guys outta the room! I'll handle the monster on my own!
engSearchText:
Get the other guys outta the room! I'll handle the
monster on my own!
jpnChrName: お前らは他の連中を部屋の外に連れていけ！ コイツの相手は俺が請け負う！
jpnSearchText:
お前らは他の連中を部屋の外に連れていけ！
コイツの相手は俺が請け負う！

engChrName: Understood. Then please, be careful!
engSearchText: Understood. Then please, be careful!
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 どうかお気をつけて──！
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
どうかお気をつけて──！

engChrName: Here I go! I hope this works!
engSearchText: Here I go! I hope this works!
jpnChrName: そんじゃいくぞ──！ 一か八かだが、やってやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃいくぞ──！
一か八かだが、やってやるぜ！

engChrName: *huff* Whew... That was a close one.
engSearchText: *huff* Whew... That was a close one.
jpnChrName: はあ、はあ……何とかなったか……
jpnSearchText: はあ、はあ……何とかなったか……

engChrName: I don't think the ceiling will hold much longer either way, though, so I'd still better hurry on out of here.
engSearchText:
I don't think the ceiling will hold much longer either
way, though, so I'd still better hurry on out of here.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、急いで避難した方が いい事には変わりねえな……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、急いで避難した方が
いい事には変わりねえな……

engChrName: I can't believe this is happening... I was supposed to be invincible as long as I had that flute.
engSearchText:
I can't believe this is happening... I was supposed to
be invincible as long as I had that flute.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな……嘘だ…… 笛さえあれば、私は完璧だというのに……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな……嘘だ……
笛さえあれば、私は完璧だというのに……！

engChrName: Tch. Almost forgot about you. Fiiine, I'll drag you outta here, too.
engSearchText:
Tch. Almost forgot about you. Fiiine, I'll drag you
outta here, too.
jpnChrName: チッ、まだコイツが残ってやがったか。 仕方ねえな……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、まだコイツが残ってやがったか。
仕方ねえな……

engChrName: Phew. Not a moment too soon, huh?
engSearchText: Phew. Not a moment too soon, huh?
jpnChrName: ふぅ、間一髪だったな。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、間一髪だったな。

engChrName: I had no idea that the ceiling was about to collapse. I'm amazed you realized, Van.
engSearchText:
I had no idea that the ceiling was about to collapse.
I'm amazed you realized, Van.
jpnChrName: まさか天井が崩れかけていただなんて…… ヴァンさんは気付いていたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
まさか天井が崩れかけていただなんて……
ヴァンさんは気付いていたんですね。

engChrName: More than anything, I'm just glad that everyone's all right...
engSearchText:
More than anything, I'm just glad that everyone's
all right...
jpnChrName: とにかくご無事で何よりでした。
jpnSearchText: とにかくご無事で何よりでした。

engChrName: I couldn't agree more.
engSearchText: I couldn't agree more.
jpnChrName: ええ、本当に……
jpnSearchText: ええ、本当に……

engChrName: Regardless, we're going to need to take this conman in robes into custody.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we're going to need to take this conman
in robes into custody.
jpnChrName: ひとまず教祖の身柄は 拘束させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず教祖の身柄は
拘束させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: Should we hand him over to the police when we get back to the surface? This seems a bit much for us to handle on our own.
engSearchText:
Should we hand him over to the police when we get
back to the surface? This seems a bit much for us to
handle on our own.
jpnChrName: 地上に戻ったら警察に引き渡しましょうか？ 流石に“裏”だけじゃ済ませられませんよね。
jpnSearchText:
地上に戻ったら警察に引き渡しましょうか？
流石に“裏”だけじゃ済ませられませんよね。

engChrName: Should we hand him over to the police when we get back to the surface? This seems a bit much for us to handle on our own.
engSearchText:
Should we hand him over to the police when we get
back to the surface? This seems a bit much for us to
